TheEeveeMod:Covet.NAME: Covet
TheEeveeMod:Covet.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL !M! percent chance to gain a relic or potion

TheEeveeMod:ExampleTwoAmountPowerCard.NAME: Two Amount Power
TheEeveeMod:ExampleTwoAmountPowerCard.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain !M! Strength and !TheEeveeMod:m2! Dexterity.

TheEeveeMod:InlinePowerDemo.NAME: Inline Power
TheEeveeMod:InlinePowerDemo.DESCRIPTION: Strikes deal !M! more damage. NL At the end of your turn, gain !M! Block.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: additional damage. At the end of your turn, gain #b

TheEeveeMod:SelectCardsPlusCardMods.NAME: Cool Card Stuff
TheEeveeMod:SelectCardsPlusCardMods.DESCRIPTION: Choose from 1 of 3 cost 0 cards from any class. NL Add it into your hand. NL It gains Ethereal and Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Choose a card to add into your hand with Ethereal and Exhaust.

TheEeveeMod:EasyXCostDemo.NAME: Easy X Cost
TheEeveeMod:EasyXCostDemo.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage X times. NL Gain X Strength. NL Exhaust.
TheEeveeMod:EasyXCostDemo.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage X+1 times. NL Gain X+1 Strength. NL Exhaust.

TheEeveeMod:EasyModalChoiceDemo.NAME: Easy Modal Choice
TheEeveeMod:EasyModalChoiceDemo.DESCRIPTION: Choose one: Draw !M! cards or gain !TheEeveeMod:m2! Strength.

TheEeveeMod:DrawAndShiv.NAME: Draw and Shiv
TheEeveeMod:DrawAndShiv.DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card. NL Add 1 *Shiv into your hand.

TheEeveeMod:TwoTypesOfDamage.NAME: Two Damage Values
TheEeveeMod:TwoTypesOfDamage.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you're Vulnerable, deal !TheEeveeMod:sd! damage instead.

TheEeveeMod:StartupBlockCard.NAME: Startup And AOE
TheEeveeMod:StartupBlockCard.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Startup: Gain !M! Block.

TheEeveeMod:MultiCardPreviewAndDrawCallb.NAME: Previews and Callbacks
TheEeveeMod:MultiCardPreviewAndDrawCallb.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle *Smite and *Safety into your draw pile. NL Draw 1 card. NL If it's Colorless, deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.
TheEeveeMod:MultiCardPreviewAndDrawCallb.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Shuffle *Smite and *Safety into your draw pile. NL Draw 1 card. NL If it's Colorless, deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.
